explanation: Agent A is correct. In the function sg_in is only read (used as memcpy source and for pointer comparison) and never modified, so it should be declared as const struct metal_sg *sg_in to satisfy MISRA C 2023 Rule 8.13. The unused parameters bus and device are likewise only observed (cast to void) and could be declared as pointers to const as well. The only caveat is an external constraint: if this definition must match a non-const prototype (for example an API or function-pointer type) then changing the parameter constness may be impossible; absent such a constraint the current code violates Rule 8.13.
